subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods’s agent, Mark Steinberg, was arrested on charges of driving while intoxicated after being stopped by police at a sobriety checkpoint in Ardsley, N.Y., on Saturday night.
snippet: Tiger Woods’s agent, Mark Steinberg, was arrested on charges of driving while intoxicated after being stopped by police at a sobriety checkpoint in Ardsley, N.Y., on Saturday night.
